layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x116
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x116
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x100
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 600x100 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 598x98
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 598x94
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 296x94 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 279x90
                text run at (2,2) width 273: "The text in this cell text should be justified"
                text run at (2,20) width 116: "which means that "
                text run at (117,20) width 163: "the right and left margins"
                text run at (2,38) width 248: "should line up, no matter how long the"
                text run at (2,56) width 279: "content becomes (except the last line which"
                text run at (2,74) width 92: "should be left "
                text run at (93,74) width 57: "aligned)."
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (300,2) size 296x94 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 279x90
                text run at (2,2) width 273: "The text in this cell text should be justified"
                text run at (2,20) width 116: "which means that "
                text run at (117,20) width 163: "the right and left margins"
                text run at (2,38) width 248: "should line up, no matter how long the"
                text run at (2,56) width 279: "content becomes (except the last line which"
                text run at (2,74) width 92: "should be left "
                text run at (93,74) width 57: "aligned)."
